definition: chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: We can have a lightning game.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以下一場快棋賽。

sentences.english: In any case, we're both capable of playing high-quality chess.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，我們都有能力賽出高質量的棋賽。

sentences.english: Each player has two bishops at the start of the game.
sentences.chinese: 棋賽開始時，每名選手有兩隻象。
